ing: 1 medium head green cabbage, rinsed and very thinly sliced
des: "The very best slaw I ever had...sweet and crunchy!  You can also substitute pineapple tidbits or chunks of fresh pineapple, if you wish."
ins: In a large bowl, stir together the cabbage, carrot, pineapple, mayonnaise and salt and let chill for at least an hour before serving.
